description: Detects unusual processes accessing desktop.ini remotely over network share, which can be leveraged to alter how Explorer displays a folder's content (i.e. renaming files) without changing them on disk. Author: Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Network Access Suspicious desktop.ini Action
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"File" AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:*\\desktop.ini AND AccessList:(*WriteData* OR *DELETE* OR *WriteDAC* OR *AppendData* OR *AddSubdirectory*))
